content.title: Fully funded on Day 1 | Thank you!
content.creator:
Nihon Safety Co., Ltd
February 26, 2025
content.content:
To all the outdoor warriors ❤️
The Wrappon Team here.
We are grateful for your incredible support in bringing Wrappon Sunny to life. Our team is more excited than ever to deliver Wrappon Sunny to you and help you experience ultimate outdoor freedom.
This journey is just beginning, and we’d love your help in spreading the word. Share the campaign with fellow adventurers, campers, and explorers - together, we can grow the Wrappon Sunny community and make an even bigger impact:
👉 Share Wrappon Sunny 👈
Thank you for being part of this incredible journey. Stay tuned - exciting updates are coming soon!
Sincerely,
The Entire Wrappon Team 🥋🔥
